title: A Christmas Carol
creator: Charles Dickens
description: LibriVox recording of A Christmas Carol, by Charles Dickens. Read by Jeff Robinson. Old miser Ebenezer Scrooge undergoes a major transformation after being visited by his deceased colleague Jacob Marley, who warns him to change his ways and has three spirits visit him on the night of Christmas Eve. (Introduction by Jeff Robinson) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: Holiday; literature; audiobook; Librivox; novella
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
